person_analysis.overview: Brad Murray is a Canadian engineering leader and entrepreneur, currently serving as Head of Engineering at Beeper, now part of Automattic. He co-founded Beeper, a unified chat platform, and previously played a pivotal role in building Pebble from its Kickstarter origins to acquisition by Fitbit. His career spans embedded systems, frontend/backend development, and engineering leadership, with a strong track record of scaling teams, fostering engineering culture, and delivering products users love.
person_analysis.executive_summary: Brad Murray is Head of Engineering at Beeper within Automattic, where he continues to lead development of a unified messaging platform. He co-founded Beeper in 2021 and was instrumental in scaling it to acquisition. Before that, he held senior roles at Faire and Fitbit, and was a foundational engineering leader at Pebble, contributing heavily to Pebble OS and scaling the company through its early explosive growth.
key_insights: Blends deep technical expertise (firmware, frontend/backend) with leadership in scaling teams.
